starter_randomizer._comment: Only current way of having shiny starters is by inverting the textures
starter_randomizer._comment2: Therefore - only have this active if you wish to have inverted textures
starter_randomizer._comment3: Only recommended if you want to do things like 'Choosing Starter' type of things
starter_randomizer._comment4: If you wish to play the game with a shiny starter without carrying about its overworld
starter_randomizer._comment5: texture when picking it - then please have it as no. Else have it as yes.
starter_randomizer._comment6: Does not work with randomize_all_gifts as it assumes you'll be playing the whole game.

tm_randomizer._comment: Work in progress - Don't turn on
